heading: A Dome of Inspirations
subheading: Textures, palettes, and moods feeding my current work
body: Between releases I collect visuals that echo the same depth and layering I aim for in UXâ€”soft gradients, tactile lighting, and organic geometry.
This rotating dome is a living moodboard pulled from public domain plus personal captures. Tap any tile to inspect it, then escape or click outside to close.

images.title: Intro
images.description: I'm Google SWE a Yale alum ('23), passionate about building 0->1!

images.title: Roots
images.description: I was born in the Bay, but grew up in Phx, AZ. Growing up in the desert fostered my passion for the outdoors (and the supernatural ability to weather scorching summers)!

images.title: Yale
images.description: I graduated with a Computer Science degree in 2023, but was involved in several many diverse campus activites spanning: CS50 & Algos (TA), Politic (Staff Writer), Admissions (Recruiter), South Asian Society & Code Haven (Mentor), Model UN (Organizer).

images.title: Bay Area
images.description: I've lived in San Francisco since graduation. In my free time, I love exploring local parks, museums, & cafes! If you're in the area, feel free to reach out for a coffee chat or city tour!

images.title: Wanderlust
images.description: I've been to 12 countries, always looking to add more stamps to my passport!

images.title: Nature Enthusiast
images.description: I love doing anything outdoorsy (hiking, climbing, running).

images.title: Film
images.description: I love nerding out and dissecting indie films (or guilty pleasure slashers). All-time favs: 2001: A Space Odyssey, Eyes Wide Shut, The Shining

images.title: Foodie
images.description: I'm a self-proclaimed foodie who enjoys discovering (and occasionally cooking) new dishes.
